Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by Milwaukee in 1965...
Had first career hit on 4/7/1966, off Billy O'Dell (SF)...
Earned first career win on 4/16/1966...
Hit first career homerun on 4/24/1968, off Ken R. Hunt (CIN)...
Injured on 4/24/1969 with a Tight Elbow, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1975, winning 2 games with a 0.51 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1976, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1978, winning 2 games with a 2.12 ERA...
